name: Oncopeptides
overview: Oncopeptides AB is a privately held company developing pharmaceuticals to treat cancer. The Company has developed proprietary technology based on creating pro-drugs with increased efficacy of already known and effective cytotoxic compounds. The lead substance, called J1 (melphalan flufenamide) is presently in a phase I/II clinical trial and is currently seeking co-development/licensing partners for the major geographical regions. Oncopeptides is a portfolio company of Karolinska Development AB publ and Stiftelsen Industrifonden.
